overview: Luzhniki Stadium / July 21, 2019 Hardwired / The Memory Remains / The Four Horsemen / Harvester of Sorrow / The Unforgiven / Now That We're Dead / Moth Into Flame / Sad But True / Halo On Fire / Frantic / One / Master of Puppets / For Whom the Bell Tolls / Creeping Death / Seek and Destroy / Spit Out The Bone / Nothing Else Matters / Enter Sandman
title: Metallica : Live in Moscow 2019
